comment: Uhlmann resigned. If Black had captured the bishop then mate in two would have followed. If you don't see how, play this against Gambit. 19...Nge7 would be best, but after capturing the rook at h8 White would have too much material.
reasoning: The comment offers a potential explanation for the mistake, suggesting a tactical opportunity for Black.
